cmg.cnsim.bitcoin

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmg.cnsim.engine.transaction.TransactionGroup
      • cmg.cnsim.bitcoin.Block
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITxContainer

    public class Block
extends TransactionGroup
    The Block class represents a block in a blockchain. It extends the TransactionGroup class.
    Author:
    Sotirios Liaskos for the Conceptual Modeling Group @ York University

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Block()
      Constructs a new Block object with the next available ID and an empty Block.Context.

      Constructs a new Block object with the next available ID and an initial list of Transaction objects and an empty context.

      • validateBlock

        public void validateBlock(java.util.ArrayList<Transaction> newTransList,
                          long simTime,
                          long sysTime,
                          int nodeID,
                          java.lang.String eventType,
                          double difficulty,
                          double cycles)
        Updates Block with information pertaining to its validation. Used in response to a validation event.
        Parameters:
        newTransList - The list of Transaction objects that are validated.
        simTime - Simulation time of the simulation event.
        sysTime - Real compute time of the simulation event.
        nodeID - ID of the Node in which validation took place.
        eventType - Textual description of the type of event (for logging).
        difficulty - Difficulty under which validation took place. TODO: link to difficulty explanation.
        cycles - The number of cycles (hashes) expended for the validation. TODO: check if this is correct.
